snippet: Donald Trump, who bought the 800-acre Doral Golf Resort for $150 million, said he planned to pour more than $200 million into the renovation of the course, designed by Gil Hanse.
abstract: Donald Trump, who bought the 800-acre Doral Golf Resort for $150 million, said he planned to pour more than $200 million into the renovation of the course, designed by Gil Hanse.

headline.main: Under New Ownership, Blue Monster Is Set for Renovation
